pageContext.claim: “House Democrats are walking back from everything they claimed with today's announcement they're now admitting there was no collusion, there was no obstruction of justice and there were no crimes whatsoever.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats decided not to include articles of impeachment that referred to the special counsel's report, on the grounds that it was politically wiser to focus on the case of Ukraine. But that does not mean they decided he did not obstruct justice. (One article referred to his alleged effort to obstruct the impeachment inquiry.) The special counsel's report stated: “If we had confidence after a thorough investigation of the facts that the President clearly did not commit obstruction of justice, we would so state. Based on the facts and the applicable legal standards, however, we are unable to reach that judgment."
